inv.name: Scrapstorm Repeater
inv.desc: Custom repeater built from refit drone parts.

inv.name: Venom Sensor Band
inv.desc: Sensor mesh that warns of toxins and purges venom.

use.text: You pull the pin and lob the grenade!
You feel the toxins fade away.

inv.name: Enhanced Artifact Blade
inv.desc: Enhanced Artifact Blade forged at the workbench.

inv.name: Enhanced Artifact Blade
inv.desc: Enhanced Artifact Blade forged at the workbench.

inv.name: Enhanced Artifact Blade
inv.desc: Enhanced Artifact Blade forged at the workbench.

inv.name: Sunflare Bazooka
inv.desc: Archivist rocket launcher packed with sunfire ordnance.

inv.name: Sunflare Bazooka
inv.desc: Archivist rocket launcher packed with sunfire ordnance.

inv.name: Sunflare Bazooka
inv.desc: Archivist rocket launcher packed with sunfire ordnance.

inv.name: Sunflare Bazooka
inv.desc: Archivist rocket launcher packed with sunfire ordnance.

npcs.name: Strange Vortex
npcs.title: A swirling vortex of dust and sand.
npcs.desc: You feel a strange pull towards it.

start.text: A swirling vortex of dust and sand blocks your path.

enter.text: You are pulled into the vortex.

npcs.name: Buried Crate
npcs.desc: Sand conceals a supply crate.

start.text: You sense something under the sand.

dig.text: You uncover a supply crate packed with scrap.

npcs.name: Archivist
npcs.title: Memory Keeper
npcs.desc: Curious about recorded tales.

start.text: The Archivist taps a reel. 'The Sun Charm hums with a lost broadcast. Bring it so I can hear the dawn.'

_chat__mff7uw9d_start.text: The Archivist peers up, tape spooling through his fingers. 'Every scrap of sound is a life. What do you bring?'

_chat__mff7uw9d_who.text: 'Just a keeper of ghosts.' He taps a stack of reels. 'These hold the before-times.'

_chat__mff7uw9d_lonely.text: 'Lonely? Maybe. But the past whispers company if you listen.'

_chat__mff7uw9d_why.text: 'Tape endures where memory fades. Magnetics don't judge.'

_chat__mff7uw9d_story.text: He feeds a reel into a rusty player. A raspy voice tells of caravans lost in sand.

_chat__mff7uw9d_listen.text: The tale winds down. 'Keep it,' he says, handing you the reel.

accept.text: The Archivist threads a fresh reel and nods. 'I'll be ready when you return—the completed broadcast will temper the epic blade you'll need for the Sovereign.'

turnin.text: The Archivist extends both hands, waiting for the artifact.

do_turnin.text: He sets the reels spinning, translating the tones into words of gratitude that harden into an epic blade's blueprint.

npcs.name: Caretaker Kesh
npcs.title: Hall Steward
npcs.desc: Weary caretaker guarding the hall's chained exit.

start.text: Caretaker Kesh eyes the chained exit.

accept.text: Try the crates. This hall sheltered survivors once. Don’t scuff the floor.

glint_fail.text: Kesh squints at the glinting key. Shiny things aren't always the best in this place.

do_turnin.text: Kesh unlocks the chain. “Off you go.”

npcs.name: Dusty Crate
npcs.desc: A dusty crate that might hide something useful.

start.text: A dusty crate rests here.

open.text: Inside you find a Rusted Key.

npcs.name: Lone Drifter
npcs.title: Mutters
npcs.desc: A drifter muttering to themselves.

start.text: Dust gets in everything.

npcs.name: Rotwalker
npcs.title: Test Monster
npcs.desc: A shambler posted here for practice.

start.text: A rotwalker lurches at you.

npcs.name: Nora
npcs.title: Storm Caller
npcs.desc: Crackling energy dances across her gauntlet.

start.text: Nora steps forward, eyes sparking.

npcs.name: Tess
npcs.title: Venom Rogue
npcs.desc: She twirls a dagger dripping with toxins.

start.text: Tess grins wickedly.

npcs.name: Worn Sign
npcs.title: Warning
npcs.desc: Faded letters warn travelers.

start.text: Rust storms east. Shelter west. Far northeast, a relay waits for the Sun Charm—Archivist sends seekers there for a blade of legend.

npcs.name: Nila the Pump-Keeper
npcs.title: Parched Farmer
npcs.desc: Sunburnt hands, hopeful eyes. Smells faintly of mud.

start.text: I can hear the pump wheeze. Need a Valve to breathe again.,Pump’s choking on sand. Only a Valve will save it.

do_turnin.text: It fits! Water again. Take this.

npcs.name: Grin
npcs.title: Scav-for-Hire
npcs.desc: Lean scav with a crowbar and half a smile.

text: Got two hands and a crowbar. You got a plan?
Crowbar’s itching for work. You hiring?
Keep to the road. The sand eats soles and souls.
Stay off the dunes. Sand chews boots.
If you're chasing Sun Charm whispers, the relay past the far northeast ruin spits out some epic blade.

choices.label: (Pay) Give 1 trinket as hire bonus
choices.failure: You have no trinket to pay with.

rec_fail.text: Charm didn't work. Got a trinket?

choices.label: (Pay) Give 1 trinket as hire bonus
choices.failure: You have no trinket to pay with.

npcs.name: Postmaster Ivo
npcs.title: Courier of Dust
npcs.desc: Dusty courier seeking a lost parcel.

start.text: Lost a courier bag on the road. Grey canvas. Reward if found.

do_turnin.text: Mail moves again. Take this stamp and a travel pass—couriers look out for their own.

effects.msg: Fast travel is now free with the courier's pass.

npcs.name: Rella
npcs.title: Radio Tech
npcs.desc: Tower technician with grease-stained hands.

start.text: Tower’s console fried. If you got a Toolkit and brains, lend both. Archivist keeps pinging me—Sun Charm wakes some relay far northeast that’s supposed to gift an edge against the Sovereign of Dust.

choices.label: (Repair) INT check with Toolkit
choices.failure: You cross a wire and pop a fuse.

accept.text: I owe you static and thanks. When the tower purrs again, follow its tone north; the Archivist tunes it toward that relay and the blade he keeps raving about.

npcs.name: The Shifting Hermit
npcs.title: Pilgrim
npcs.desc: A cloaked hermit murmuring about rusted idols.

start.text: Something rust-holy sits in the ruins. Bring the Idol.

accept.text: The sand will guide or bury you. Pilgrims whisper that the Sun Charm opens the far northeast ruin where the Archivist forges a blade fit for dust-born kings.

do_turnin.text: The idol warms. You are seen.

npcs.name: Scrap Duchess
npcs.title: Toll-Queen
npcs.desc: A crown of bottlecaps; eyes like razors.

rumors.text: Radio crackles from the north; idol whispers from the south. Archivist’s Sun Charm is the key—wake that far-northeast relay and it spits an epic blade to cleave the Sovereign.

npcs.name: Signal Tech
npcs.title: Tinkerer
npcs.desc: Fiddles with a busted radio.

start.text: Radio's dead. Need fragments to spark it. Archivist in the Test Hall swears the last shard hums in that northeast relay sealed behind the old tower.

accept.text: Try the dunes; bits wash up there. When you nab the Sun Charm, take it northeast and wake the relay so the Archivist can catch the broadcast.

do_turnin.text: Signal hums again. Nice work. Archivist said that resonance forges blades fit to carve dust-kings.

npcs.name: Road Raider
npcs.title: Bandit
npcs.desc: Scarred scav looking for trouble.

start.text: A raider blocks the path, eyeing your gear.

choices.label: (Talk) Stand down
choices.success: He grunts and lets you pass.

npcs.name: Cass the Trader
npcs.title: Shopkeep
npcs.desc: A roving merchant weighing your wares.

start.text: Got goods to sell? I pay in scrap.

npcs.name: Tess the Scout
npcs.title: Water Runner
npcs.desc: She checks the pump then the far ridge.

start.text: Tess strides past on her rounds.

npcs.name: Feral Nomad
npcs.title: Mad Drifter
npcs.desc: A wild-eyed drifter muttering to himself.

start.text: He lunges without warning.

npcs.name: Iron Brute
npcs.desc: A hulking brute plated in scrap.

start.text: The brute roars.

npcs.name: Brakk
npcs.title: Power Trainer
npcs.desc: A former arena champ teaching raw strength.

start.text: Brakk cracks his knuckles.

npcs.name: Rusty
npcs.title: Endurance Trainer
npcs.desc: A grizzled scavenger preaching survival.

start.text: Rusty studies your stance.

npcs.name: Mira
npcs.title: Tricks Trainer
npcs.desc: A nimble tinkerer teaching odd moves.

start.text: Mira twirls a coin.

npcs.name: Nora
npcs.title: Worm Seller
npcs.desc: She trades memory worms for scrap.

start.text: Fresh worms for fading sins.

npcs.name: One-Armed Bandit
npcs.title: Slot Machine
npcs.desc: It wheezes, eager for scrap.

start.text: Lights sputter behind cracked glass.

npcs.name: Workbench
npcs.title: Crafter
npcs.desc: Tools litter the surface.

npcs.name: Scrap Behemoth
npcs.desc: A towering mass of twisted metal.

start.text: The behemoth looms.

npcs.name: Sparking Crate
npcs.desc: Faint humming echoes from inside.

start.text: A crate vibrates with energy.

open.text: Inside you find a Spark Key.

npcs.name: Humming Door
npcs.title: To Workshop
npcs.desc: Its lock crackles for a Spark Key.

start.text: The door is sealed.

accept.text: Its lock crackles for a Spark Key.

npcs.name: Gear Crate
npcs.desc: Loose gears rattle within.

start.text: The crate is heavy with metal.

open.text: Among the gears is a Cog Key.

npcs.name: Rust Door
npcs.title: To Archive
npcs.desc: Its hinges await a Cog Key.

start.text: The door is locked tight.

accept.text: Its hinges await a Cog Key.

npcs.name: Dust Rat
npcs.title: Menace
npcs.desc: A rat swollen with dust.

start.text: The rat bares its teeth.

npcs.name: Gear Ghoul
npcs.title: Guardian
npcs.desc: A whirring husk hungry for scraps.

start.text: The ghoul clanks forward.

npcs.name: Hope Beacon
npcs.title: Lightbringer
npcs.desc: A small lamp pulsing warmly.

start.text: The beacon glows, promising brighter days.

reward.text: You pocket the charm. The light feels hopeful.

npcs.name: Siltpack Ravener
npcs.title: Ambush Brood
npcs.desc: Dust-choked hunters sniffing out living heat.

start.text: Dust-raw beasts prowl the outer ring, sniffing for intruders.

npcs.name: Echo Relay
npcs.title: Signal Lattice
npcs.desc: Cracked relay thrumming with stored light.

start.text: A cracked relay trembles atop the altar. Archivist schematics are etched around a Sun Charm-shaped cradle.

accept.text: Diagrams glow faintly, tracing a path from the Archivist's hall to this relay. Only the Sun Charm's light will wake it.

resonate.text: The relay's coils flare when the Sun Charm draws close, begging to drink in its dawnlight.

grant.text: Light floods the relay and condenses into a prismatic shard. Signal Fragment C thrums warm in your grip.

npcs.name: Medic Lysa
npcs.title: Workshop Healer
npcs.desc: A weary medic sorting salvaged herbs.

start.text: Lysa fans fumes from an improvised still. 'My scout's fading. I need an antidote brewed at this bench—water flasks and plant fiber will do.'

accept.text: Bring one water flask and plant fiber to the workbench, then craft an antidote for Bren.

turnin.text: Did you brew the antidote? Bren doesn't have long.

effects.msg: Lysa rushes the antidote to Bren.

do_turnin.text: She pours the cure between Bren's lips. The scout jolts awake, coughing but alert.

npcs.name: Scout Bren
npcs.title: Sandway Patrol
npcs.desc: A scout slumped against the wall, breathing shallowly.

locked.text: Bren wheezes, skin ashen. They can't answer until the antidote works.

start.text: Bren wipes the antidote foam from their chin and straightens up.

accept.text: Lysa kept me alive, but I need one solid bandage before I head out. The workbench can spin plant fiber into one fast.

turnin.text: Got that bandage? I don't want to limp into the dunes bare-handed.

effects.msg: Bren wraps the bandage around their side.

do_turnin.text: Perfect fit. I'll scout the relay routes again—stop by the map table once I signal back.

npcs.name: Mahra
npcs.title: Hall Envoy
npcs.desc: An envoy wringing her hands over desert politics.

start.text: Mahra paces between supply crates. 'The Duke of the Wastes runs every caravan. If we want munitions, we need his favor. Will you go to his desert lair and win him over?'

choices.label: (Turn in) The Duke is on our side.

accept.text: Charm is his currency. Lead with confidence and he might trade favors for our help.

status.text: He respects bold tongues. Impress him with your charisma and do not flinch.

turnin.text: You turned the Duke our way? That unlocks his munitions caches.

post_quest.text: Three frag grenades should remind the wastes who our friends are. We'll send word to the caravans.

npcs.name: Duke of the Wastes
npcs.title: Desert Sovereign
npcs.desc: The Duke lounges on a rusted throne surrounded by sand-bitten trophies.

start.text: A throne of rust looms over dunes of sand poured inside the lair.

favor_granted.text: The Duke taps a ring against his goblet before nodding. 'Send word to Mahra that my caravans will carry her grenades. Tell her I expect the Hall to answer when I call.'

npcs.name: Waystation Bunker
npcs.desc: A sealed terminal waits among the dunes.

start.text: The terminal is dark behind layers of dust.

activate.text: You patch the cabling and power surges through the console.

npcs.name: Ridge Bunker
npcs.desc: An old transit hub overlooking the cracked ridge.

start.text: The console flickers, waiting for a reboot.

activate.text: You rewire the junction and the bunker hums awake.

npcs.name: Overlook Bunker
npcs.desc: A tower terminal jutting from the cracked highway.

start.text: A warning light blinks behind the grime-streaked glass.

activate.text: Power reroutes through the old transit grid.

npcs.name: Hidden Hermit
npcs.title: Lurker
npcs.desc: A hermit steps out when you return.

start.text: Didn't expect company twice. If you're trekking near those Ashen pits, remember Ashen Howlers hate getting stunned—clip on a Stun Gear Harness trinket and their chorus falls apart.

npcs.name: Hidden Hermit
npcs.title: Lurker
npcs.desc: A hermit steps out when you return.

start.text: Didn't expect company twice. If you're trekking near those Ashen pits, remember Ashen Howlers hate getting stunned—clip on a Stun Gear Harness trinket and their chorus falls apart.

npcs.name: Hidden Hermit
npcs.title: Lurker
npcs.desc: A hermit steps out when you return.

start.text: Didn't expect company twice. If you're trekking near those Ashen pits, remember Ashen Howlers hate getting stunned—clip on a Stun Gear Harness trinket and their chorus falls apart.

npcs.name: Hidden Hermit
npcs.title: Lurker
npcs.desc: A hermit steps out when you return.

start.text: Didn't expect company twice. If you're trekking near those Ashen pits, remember Ashen Howlers hate getting stunned—clip on a Stun Gear Harness trinket and their chorus falls apart.

npcs.name: Hidden Hermit
npcs.title: Lurker
npcs.desc: A hermit steps out when you return.

start.text: Didn't expect company twice. If you're trekking near those Ashen pits, remember Ashen Howlers hate getting stunned—clip on a Stun Gear Harness trinket and their chorus falls apart.

q_hall_key.title: Find the Rusted Key
q_hall_key.desc: Search the hall for a Rusted Key to unlock the exit.

q_waterpump.title: Water for the Pump
q_waterpump.desc: Find a Valve and help Nila restart the pump.

q_recruit_grin.title: Recruit Grin
q_recruit_grin.desc: Convince or pay Grin to join.

q_postal.title: Lost Parcel
q_postal.desc: Find and return the Lost Satchel to Ivo to earn his courier reward and a travel pass.

q_tower.title: Dead Air
q_tower.desc: Repair the radio tower console (Toolkit helps).

q_idol.title: Rust Idol
q_idol.desc: Recover the Rust Idol from roadside ruins.

q_toll.title: Toll-Booth Etiquette
q_toll.desc: You met the Duchess on the road.

q_signal.title: Broken Signal
q_signal.desc: Collect three signal fragments in the wastes.

q_spark.title: Spark the Way
q_spark.desc: Find the Spark Key to open the workshop.

q_cog.title: Unlock the Archive
q_cog.desc: Find the Cog Key to reach the beacon.

q_beacon.title: Light the Beacon
q_beacon.desc: Defeat the Gear Ghoul and claim hope.

q_solar_alignment.title: Align the Sun
q_solar_alignment.desc: Deliver the Sun Charm to the Archivist in the Hall so he can decode the broadcast and chart a path to the missing fragment.

q_solar_signal.title: Resonate the Signal
q_solar_signal.desc: Recover Signal Fragment C from the echo relay hidden in the far northeast so the Archivist can finish the broadcast and unlock the Epic Blade.

q_antidote_aid.title: Antidote Assembly
q_antidote_aid.desc: Collect water flasks and plant fiber, then craft an antidote at the workshop for Medic Lysa.

q_scout_recon.title: Scout's Return
q_scout_recon.desc: Once the antidote works, bring Scout Bren a bandage so they can rejoin patrol duty.

q_curry_favor.title: Currying Favor
q_curry_favor.desc: Earn the Duke of the Wastes' respect for the Hall.

task_grudge_sour_routes.title: Sour Cass's Routes
task_grudge_sour_routes.desc: Tip off rival caravans to rile Cass and raise her grudge.

task_grudge_patch_wagon.title: Patch Cass's Wagon
task_grudge_patch_wagon.desc: Deliver spare parts so Cass eases her grudge.

weapon.name: Enhanced Artifact Blade
weapon.desc: Enhanced Artifact Blade forged at the workbench.

armor.name: Starfall Longcoat
armor.desc: Reinforced dustcloak lined with quickdraw servos.

trinket.name: Antitoxin Locket
trinket.desc: A sealed charm that scrubs toxins from your blood.

weapon.name: Enhanced Artifact Blade
weapon.desc: Enhanced Artifact Blade forged at the workbench.

armor.name: Sealed Hazard Suit
armor.desc: Reinforced suit with detox canisters. Grants poison immunity.

weapon.name: Enhanced Artifact Blade
weapon.desc: Enhanced Artifact Blade forged at the workbench.

nyx.veiled.label: Veiled Nyx
nyx.veiled.portraitPrompt: Moody illustration of Nyx, a lithe mystic draped in layered dusk-blue robes, translucent veil mask stitched with glowing threads, bioluminescent tattoos, twilight storm clouds behind her, soft moonlit highlights, enigmatic calm expression.

jax.patchwork.label: Patchwork Jax
jax.patchwork.portraitPrompt: Gritty concept art portrait of Jax, a muscular scavenger with a patchwork mask welded from mismatched metal plates, neon welding glow reflections, improvised armor straps, cybernetic arm details, ruined factory background, dramatic rim lighting.

mara.masked.label: Masked Mara
mara.masked.portraitPrompt: Cinematic digital painting of Mara, a weathered navigator in scavenged desert armor, wearing a cracked porcelain mask with thin gold inlay, warm campfire lighting, windswept hair, determined expression, post-apocalyptic wasteland backdrop.
